definition: compound with many families living together
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: The family that sold it to Mr. Gittes had turned it into a warren of apartments for various relatives.
sentences.chinese: 卖给吉茨的这家人把它变成了众多亲属居住的大杂院。

sentences.english: Southern wall into our courtyard garden.
sentences.chinese: 南墙根成了我们大杂院的菜园子。

sentences.english: A few colourful dragon-flies even carne to flit over the puddles in the tenement yard.
sentences.chinese: 连大杂院里的水坑上也来了几个各色的蜻蜓。

definition: courtyard house with a fully enclosed courtyard (type of Chinese residence)
Pingfang district of Harbin 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1] in Heilongjiang
"shikumen" style architecture: traditional (ca. 19th century) residences with courtyards, once common in Shanghai
residence consisting of structures surrounding a courtyard on three sides
yaodong (a kind of cave dwelling in the Loess Plateau in northwest China)/CL:孔[kong3]
a building of two or more stories/CL:棟|栋[dong4],幢[zhuang4],座[zuo4]
